info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 03 at 3:22PM EST until January 03 at 6:00PM EST by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow, heavy at times. Additional snow accumulations of up to two inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Portions of southern New Jersey and central and southern Delaware. * WHEN...Until 6 PM EST this evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The snow will wind down by early this evening.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
